overview: Creepy man named "The Kisser" attacks strangers on the NYC subway, by handing out unwanted kisses and inserting bugs into their mouths. Community helpline 'Bobo Touch' takes extra measures to solve this case. Directors: Bobo Touch, Brian Bonz, Mike Rizzo; Stars: Brian Bonz, Mike Rizzo, Nicholas M. Garofolo, Bonnie Schneider and Mike Strandberg; Film screened at Manhattan Film Festival, Festival of Cinema NYC and Coney Island Film Festival in 2019
tagline: Creepy man named "The Kisser" attacks strangers on the NYC subway, by handing out unwanted kisses and inserting bugs into their mouths
title: Bobo Touch Helpline - The Kisser
